name: Jump Adventures 2
description:
Are you ready?

Jump Adventures 2 is a platformer game inspired by golden games of ZX Spectrum and Commodore 64 era. You recently got a floppy of a brand new exclusive for BlueOS by Pravum Entertainment Software called "Jump Adventures", which you can't wait to play!

Brand new adventure

The original Jump Adventures was the developer's first try in developing a more elaborate game. Being a beginner, he couldn't bring his vision in it's entirety to life.
Jump Adventures 2 revisits the vision and refreshes it with brand new stylish graphics, more content, and story, over 3 years since the release of the predecessor.

World 1: Obsidian Monoliths

Obsidian Monoliths is a hot place. Bubbling lava will fry up anyone that is not careful enough, and razor sharp spikes are not making for a good yoga experience...
You wake up by an unknown voice that encourages you to learn how to escape those forgotten lands. You can't remember anything, and even the surface memories seem unreachable. 
A free demo of the first world will be available September 12th 2020.
